mdRecord.dcterms:title: Leader of the Pack by Sherman Ewing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the Aug 24-29 play Leader of the Pack by Sherman Ewing. Actors include Salem Ludwig, Liz Ingleson. Directed by Clinton Atkinson.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
